Class SidebarController

  • java.lang.Object

    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.EventListener, Controller

    public final class SidebarController
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ChangeListener
implements Controller
    Controls the sidebar in the GameScreen

    Paulius, Miguel

        public SidebarController(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Table sidebar,
                 AircraftController aircrafts,
                 GameScreen screen,
                 MenuController mc)
        Parameters:
        sidebar - the sidebar layout, so the controller can add all of the buttons
        aircrafts - so this can get the selected aircraft
        screen - for changing screens once Menu or Pause have been clicked
